# Leader(s)

name those responsible to coordinating progress, submission and closing of the challenge

# Difficulty & duration

- novice, intermediate, advanced
- given an estimate of the time needed to resolve the challenge

# Abstract

briefly describe the challenge's motivation and context

# Targets

summarize specific targets for the challenge, e.g.

- implement a function to plot something
- write a vignette on how to do something

and (if possible) give links to a repository/package outcomes should be contributed to and/or associated any GitHub issue(s).
